import math
for _ in range(int(input())):
    x = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    s = set(l)
    a = len(s)
    if a > 1:
        print(int(math.factorial(a) / (math.factorial(2) * math.factorial(a - 2))))
    else:
        print(0)
